title: Facilitate reproducible and archived projects
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

title: Build dev project — projr_build_dev
text: Builds project output, means recording input output data hashes, building actual bookdown document saving archiving selected output.

title: Build dev project — projr_build_dev
text: bump logical. Whether increment dev version build. Default FALSE. ... Arguments passed bookdown::render.

title: Build project to output — projr_build_output
text: Builds project output, means recording input output data hashes, building actual bookdown document saving archiving selected output.

title: Build project to output — projr_build_output
text: bump_component "major", "minor", "patch" missing. Specifies version component increment. missing, set equal lowest version component used version format. default (.e. missing default). msg character. Message append Git commit messages. Default NULL, case user prompted message , session interactive, left empty. Default NULL. Note Git messages case blank - simply consist details version bumped stage build process commit made. ... Arguments passed bookdown::render.

title: Create a directory in _projr.yml — projr_dir_create
text: Creates directory listed _projr.yml current projr profile. add .gitignore .Rbuildignore well required.

title: Create a directory in _projr.yml — projr_dir_create
text: label character. One "data_raw", "cache","output", "archive" "docs". Class directory return. "docs" option returns path output directory bookdown::render_book (specified "_bookdown.yml"), whereas others returns paths specified "_projr.yml".

what: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
text: Returns path projr profile-specific directory. Also creates directory exist, ignores requested _projr.yml.

title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
code: projr_dir_get(   label,   ...,   create = TRUE,   path_relative_force = FALSE,   output_safe = TRUE,   path_absolute_force = FALSE )

title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
text: label character. One "data_raw", "cache","output", "archive" "docs". Class directory return. "docs" option returns path output directory bookdown::render_book (specified "_bookdown.yml"), whereas others returns paths specified "_projr.yml". ... Specifies sub-directory directory returned. Passed file.path. create logical. TRUE, directory created exist ignored () .gitignore .Rbuildignore specified _projr.yml. Default TRUE. path_relative_force logical. TRUE, forces returned path relative project root. Default FALSE. output_safe logical. TRUE, output directory set "<path_to_cache>/projr_output" instead <path_to_output> (specified _projr.yml). time set TRUE projr_build_output run, otherwise "development" test runs add , delete overwrite files previous run projr_build_output. Default TRUE. path_absolute_force logical. TRUE, forces returned path absolute. Default FALSE.

title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
text: Character. Path directory requested.

title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
text: DETAILS

title: Return path to profile-specific directory — projr_dir_get
Initialise project — projr_init
text: Initialise project

title: Initialise project — projr_init
code: projr_init(   dir_proj = getwd(),   yml_path_from = NULL,   renv_force = FALSE,   renv_bioconductor = TRUE )

title: Initialise project — projr_init
text: dir_proj character. Project directory. Default getwd(). yml_path_from character. Path YAML file use _projr.yml. supplied, default _projr.yml file used. renv_force Logical. Passed renv::init(). FALSE, renv::init() run detects working directory already registered renv. Default FALSE. renv_bioconductor Logical. Whether renv look packages Bioconductor. Default TRUE.

title: Return path — projr_path_get
text: Returns path projr profile-specific directory. Differs projr_dir_get assume path directory. create parent directory specified path exist, ignore requested _projr.yml.

title: Return path — projr_path_get
code: projr_path_get(   label,   ...,   create = TRUE,   path_relative_force = FALSE,   output_safe = TRUE )

title: Return path — projr_path_get
text: label character. One "data_raw", "cache","output", "archive" "docs". Class directory return. "docs" option returns path output directory bookdown::render_book (specified "_bookdown.yml"), whereas others returns paths specified "_projr.yml". ... Specifies sub-path directory returned. create logical. TRUE, parent directory created exist ignored () .gitignore .Rbuildignore specified _projr.yml. Default TRUE. path_relative_force logical. TRUE, forces returned path relative project root. Default FALSE. output_safe logical. TRUE, output directory set "<path_to_cache>/projr_output" instead <path_to_output> (specified _projr.yml). time set TRUE projr_build_output run, otherwise "development" test runs add , delete overwrite files previous run projr_build_output. Default TRUE.

title: Return path — projr_path_get
text: Character. Path directory requested.

title: Add projr profile — projr_profile_create
text: Creates new projr profile overrides settings _projr.yml. profile becomes active either working directory (rprojroot::is_r_package$find_file()) Sys.getenv("PROJR_PROFILE") equal profile.

title: Add projr profile — projr_profile_create
code: projr_profile_create(   profile = NULL,   method = "key",   silent = Sys.getenv("PROJR_TEST") == "TRUE" )

title: Add projr profile — projr_profile_create
text: profile character. NULL, name profile. NULL environment variable PROJR_PROFILE set, made equal value. variable set, made equal working directory. method "key" "file". Specifies projr profile specified. "key" (default), additional profile added new keys _projr.yml form directories-<profile> build-<profile>. "file", file _projr-<profile>.yml created -null values sub-keys build directories keys _projr.yml. Default NULL. silent logical. TRUE, messages suppressed. Default TRUE environment variable PROJR_TEST "TRUE".

title: Add projr profile — projr_profile_create
text: Invisibly returns new projr profile.

title: Add projr profile — projr_profile_create
text: Note setting projr profile-specific setting empty (indicated ~ YAML file default), corresponding setting _projr.yml used. using method = "file", profile automatically specified working directory must specified either PROJR_PROFILE profile argument.

what: Create a local projr profile — projr_profile_create_local
title: Create a local projr profile — projr_profile_create_local
text: Create projr profile highest precedence (.e. settings overwrite others) ignored Git. Useful avoid bloat many entries _projr.yml extra _projr-<profile>.yml files. Creates file _projr-local.yml empty settings ignores .Rbuildignore .gitignore.

title: Create a local projr profile — projr_profile_create_local
Create a local projr profile — projr_profile_create_local
text: Note setting _projr-local.yml empty, lower-precendence file's setting (.e. _projr-<profile>.yml _projr.yml) used. Empty settings default indicated ~.

what: Delete a projr profile from _projr.yml — projr_profile_delete
title: Delete a projr profile from _projr.yml — projr_profile_delete
text: Deletes projr profile _projr.yml /corresponding _projr-<profile>.yml file.

title: Delete a projr profile from _projr.yml — projr_profile_delete
Delete a projr profile from _projr.yml — projr_profile_delete
text: profile character. projr profile delete.

title: Delete a projr profile from _projr.yml — projr_profile_delete
text: invisible(TRUE).

what: Delete local projr settings file. — projr_profile_delete_local
title: Delete local projr settings file. — projr_profile_delete_local
text: Deletes _projr-local.yml file.

title: Delete local projr settings file. — projr_profile_delete_local
Get active projr profile — projr_profile_get
text: Get active projr profile. setting, preference given specified _projr-local.yml , failing , _projr-<profile>.yml (build-<profile> directories-<profile> keys). Note active projr profile equal PROJR_PROFILE environment variable latter set corresponding profile exists (either keys  _projr.yml file _projr-<profile>.yml).

title: Get active projr profile — projr_profile_get
text: Character vector length 1 corresponding active projr profile. "default" returned, profile active. Note _projr-local.yml file always overwrite profile-specific default settings.

title: Bump development version — projr_version_dev_bump
text: Increase development component version.

title: Bump development version — projr_version_dev_bump
text: Invisibly returns new version.

title: Get version format — projr_version_format_get
text: Returns version format, species depth semantic versioning levels used (e.g. major major, minor patch) well separators versions (periods dashes).

title: Get version format — projr_version_format_set
text: Returns version format, species depth semantic versioning levels used (e.g. major major, minor patch) well separators versions (periods dashes).

title: Get version format — projr_version_format_set
text: version_format character. version format. Specifies version components ("major" /"minor" /"patch", "dev"/"1"/"9000"), well separators . "1" used instead "dev", "dev" component resets "1". "9000" used instead "dev", "dev" component resets "9000". "dev" used, "dev" component resets "9000". Examples: "major.minor-1", "major-minor-patch-dev", "major.9000". Default "major.minor.patch.dev".

what: Return the next version to be built — projr_version_get
title: Return the next version to be built — projr_version_get
text: Returns version project currently worked , defined whichever version later DESCRIPTION _bookdown.yml. Typically simply version _bookdown.yml.

title: Return the next version to be built — projr_version_get
Return the next version to be built — projr_version_get
text: dev_force logical. TRUE, returned version necessarily dev component. Default FALSE.

title: Return the next version to be built — projr_version_get
text: Character.

title: Set project version — projr_version_set
text: Set project version manually. Sometimes may necessary , example, collaborator built pushed project whilst made updates, want manually increase version (rather merging changes first).

title: Set project version — projr_version_set
text: version character. Version set. May dev version (.e. include dev component) .

title: Check active projr settings. — projr_yml_check
text: Checks correctness active projr settings.

title: Check active projr settings. — projr_yml_check
text: yml_projr list. Projr settings. supplied, results projr_yml_get_unchecked used.

title: Check active projr settings. — projr_yml_check
text: Returns TRUE checks pass. Otherwise throws error.

what: Get active projr settings and checks for validity — projr_yml_get
title: Get active projr settings and checks for validity — projr_yml_get
text: Gets active projr settings, merges settings resolves conflicts local (_projr-local.yml), profile (_projr-<projr>.yml - keys _projr.yml) default (_projr.yml) settings. conflicts, local settings highest precedence (.e. always preferred) default settings lowest precedence (.e. never preferred). Note error thrown active settings invalid.

title: Get active projr settings and checks for validity — projr_yml_get
Get active projr settings and checks for validity — projr_yml_get
text: named list, settings valid.

what: Get active projr settings and do no check — projr_yml_get_unchecked
title: Get active projr settings and do no check — projr_yml_get_unchecked
text: list active projr settings, without error checking. Gets active projr settings, merges settings resolves conflicts local (_projr-local.yml), profile (_projr-<projr>.yml - keys _projr.yml) default (_projr.yml) settings. conflicts, local settings highest precedence (.e. always preferred) default settings lowest precedence (.e. never preferred).

title: Get active projr settings and do no check — projr_yml_get_unchecked
Get active projr settings and do no check — projr_yml_get_unchecked
text: named list.
